import React from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup' function OrderDetails({data, smallScreen}) { return ( {data.products.map((item, index) => (
{smallScreen && item.name.length > 11 ? `${item.name.slice(0, 11)}...` : item.name}
{item.category === 'food' ? `${item.quantity} plate ` : item.category === 'meat' ? ` ${item.quantity} pieces ` : `${item.quantity} pieces `}
{!smallScreen && (
)}
))} ) } export default OrderDetails
